title: Arbiter of Hell

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player's house to become Hell. You cannot move Hell, unless that player dies.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players who visit Hell during a full moon are subjected to the following effects in the order:
> - You learn their role
> - Roleblocked
> - Basic attacked
> - Framed
> - Basic attacked
> - Given powerful defense for this night
> - Lynchproof for one day
> - Basic rampage attacked
> - Powerfully poisoned
- If a player dies, the effects after are not applied.
- Hell remains after you die.
- With the Necronomicon, you may have two Hells active at a time.

desc:
Post 316
*Boring is removed! You did not gain Cursed, so you die! Cursed is removed! Heavy is removed! You are not in the majority, so you die from Insanity! Insanity is removed! Light is removed! You skip this round due to Paralyzed! Paralyzed is removed! Restrained is removed! Scared is removed! Saint saves you from dying due to Cursed! Saint is removed! Tradition is removed!*
